text:
As of 9am 10 April, 316,836 tests have concluded, with 19,116 tests on 9 April. 

256,605 people have been tested of which 73,758 tested positive. 

As of 5pm on 9 April, of those hospitalised in the UK who tested positive for coronavirus, 8,958 have sadly died. https://t.co/m6gDZBMUWb

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus
